snippet: Gatherings of a group of California professionals in the depths of unemployment reveal a post-recession landscape where grim frustration battles with the simple desire to find a way out.
abstract: Dozens of Southern California professionals in the depths of long-term unemployment belong to Experience Unlimited, a kind of self-help program that is part of the state's effort to help residents find jobs; meetings, functioning as a combination of support group and training ground, reveal a grim post-recession landscape in a state with an unemployment rate of 10.7 percent.
lead_paragraph: Gatherings of a group of California professionals in the depths of unemployment reveal a post-recession landscape where grim frustration battles with the simple desire to find a way out.

headline.seo: Unemployment Depths Seen in California Peer Group
headline.main: Long-Term Jobless Regroup to Fight the Odds
headline.print_headline: Long-Term Jobless Regroup to Fight the Odds
